痗字的基本解释

痗
mèi
病：“安能咎往事，且欲去沉痗。”
忧伤成病：“愿言思伯，使我心痗。”

痗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèi］
［《廣韻》莫佩切，去隊，明。］
［《廣韻》荒内切，去隊，曉。］
病；忧伤。

痗字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痗； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页773第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫佩切，音昧。病也。【詩·衞風】使我心痗。又【小雅】悠悠我里，亦孔之痗。【傳】痗，病也。【謝惠連詩】積憤成疢痗。　又【廣韻】荒內切【集韻】呼內切，?音誨。又【集韻】【韻會】母罪切【正韻】莫賄切，?音凂。又【集韻】虎猥切，音悔。義?同。

痗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痗字的起名意思

暂无。

disease caused by anxiety
Basic explanation of words
disease caused by anxiety
mèi
Sickness: "An Neng blames the past and wants to get rid of it."
Grief and sickness: "I wish to talk about the uncle and make my heart crunch."

[①]［mèi］
["Guangyun" Mo Peche, go to the team, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" cut the barren inside, go to the team, Xiao. ]
Sickness; sadness.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痗; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 773 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Mo Peiqie, the sound is ambiguous. Sick too. [Poetry·Weifeng] It makes my heart irritated. And [Xiaoya] You are in my place, and I have a hole in it. [Biography] 痗, sickness. [Xie Huilian Poems] Accumulation of indignation becomes epilepsy.　 [Guang Yun] Huang Qiyun [Jiyun] Calling for internal cutting,? Yin 诲. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Mother sin cut 【Zheng Yun】Don’t bribe and cut,? The sound is magnificent. Also 【Jiyun】The tiger is cut, and the sound regrets. Righteous? Same.
